verses.text: These \add are\add* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* to \w make|strong="H3772"\w* with the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, beside the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* which he \w made|strong="H3772"\w* with them in \w Horeb|strong="H2722"\w*.

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* unto all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Ye have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* all that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* before your \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* unto \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, and unto all his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, and unto all his \w land|strong="H0776"\w*;

The \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w temptations|strong="H4531"\w* which thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w*, the \w signs|strong="H0226"\w*, and those \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w miracles|strong="H4159"\w*:

Yet the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath not \w given|strong="H5414"\w* you an \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* to \w perceive|strong="H3045"\w*, and \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* to \w see|strong="H7200"\w*, and \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* to \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

And I have \w led|strong="H3212"\w* you \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*: your \w clothes|strong="H8008"\w* are not waxen \w old|strong="H1086"\w* upon you, and thy \w shoe|strong="H5275"\w* is not waxen \w old|strong="H1086"\w* upon thy \w foot|strong="H7272"\w*.

Ye have not \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, neither have ye \w drunk|strong="H8354"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* or strong \w drink|strong="H7941"\w*: that ye might \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

And when ye \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, \w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w*, and \w Og|strong="H5747"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*, came \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w against|strong="H7125"\w* us unto \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, and we \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* them:

And we \w took|strong="H3947"\w* their \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* it for an \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* unto the \w Reubenites|strong="H7206"\w*, and to the \w Gadites|strong="H1425"\w*, and to the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4520"\w*.

\w Keep|strong="H8104"\w* therefore the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of this \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* them, that ye may \w prosper|strong="H7919"\w* in all that ye \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.

¶ Ye \w stand|strong="H5324"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* all of you \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; your \w captains|strong="H7218"\w* of your \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w*, your \w elders|strong="H2205"\w*, and your \w officers|strong="H7860"\w*, \add with\add* all the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*,

Your little \w ones|strong="H2945"\w*, your \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*, and thy \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* that \add is\add* \w in|strong="H7130"\w* thy \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, from the \w hewer|strong="H2404"\w* of thy \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* unto the \w drawer|strong="H7579"\w* of thy \w water|strong="H4325"\w*:

That thou shouldest \w enter|strong="H5674"\w* into \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and into his \w oath|strong="H0423"\w*, which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w maketh|strong="H3772"\w* with thee this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*:  +  r 29.12  t enter: Heb. pass *

That he may \w establish|strong="H6965"\w* thee to \w day|strong="H3117"\w* for a \w people|strong="H5971"\w* unto himself, and \add that\add* he may be unto thee a \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, as he hath \w said|strong="H1696"\w* unto thee, and as he hath \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* unto thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, to \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w*, to \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*, and to \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*.
Neither with you only do I \w make|strong="H3772"\w* this \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* and this \w oath|strong="H0423"\w*;

But with \add him\add* that \w standeth|strong="H5975"\w* here with us \w this|strong="H3426"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and also with \add him\add* that \add is\add* not here with us this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*:

(For ye \w know|strong="H3045"\w* how we have \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*; and how we \w came|strong="H5674"\w* \w through|strong="H7130"\w* the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* which ye passed \w by|strong="H5674"\w*;

And ye have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* their \w abominations|strong="H8251"\w*, and their \w idols|strong="H1544"\w*, \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* and \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*, \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* and \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, which \add were\add* among them:)\f + \fr 29.17 \ft idols: Heb. dungy gods\f*

Lest there should \w be|strong="H3426"\w* among you \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, or \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, or \w family|strong="H4940"\w*, or \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w*, whose \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* turneth \w away|strong="H6437"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, to \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \add and\add* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of these \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*; lest there should \w be|strong="H3426"\w* among you a \w root|strong="H8328"\w* that \w beareth|strong="H6509"\w* \w gall|strong="H7219"\w* and \w wormwood|strong="H3939"\w*;\f + \fr 29.18 \ft gall: or, a poisonous herb: Heb. rosh\f*

And it come to pass, when he \w heareth|strong="H8085"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of this \w curse|strong="H0423"\w*, that he \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* himself in his \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, I shall have \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \w though|strong="H3588"\w* I \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in the \w imagination|strong="H8307"\w* of mine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, to \w add|strong="H5595"\w* \w drunkenness|strong="H7302"\w* to \w thirst|strong="H6771"\w*:\f + \fr 29.19 \ft imagination: or, stubbornness\f*\f + \fr 29.19 \ft drunkenness…: Heb. the drunken to the thirsty\f*

The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w will|strong="H0014"\w* not \w spare|strong="H5545"\w* him, but then the \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* and his \w jealousy|strong="H7068"\w* shall \w smoke|strong="H6225"\w* against that \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, and all the \w curses|strong="H0423"\w* that are \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in this \w book|strong="H5612"\w* shall \w lie|strong="H7257"\w* upon him, and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall blot \w out|strong="H4229"\w* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* from under \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w separate|strong="H0914"\w* him unto \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* out of all the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, according to all the \w curses|strong="H0423"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* that are \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in this \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w law|strong="H8451"\w*:\f + \fr 29.21 \ft are: Heb. is\f*

So that the \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* to \w come|strong="H0314"\w* of your \w children|strong="H1121"\w* that shall rise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* you, and the \w stranger|strong="H5237"\w* that shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* from a \w far|strong="H7350"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, when they \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w plagues|strong="H4347"\w* of that \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and the \w sicknesses|strong="H8463"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w laid|strong="H2470"\w* upon it;\f + \fr 29.22 \ft which…: Heb. wherewith the \+nd LORD\+nd* hath made it sick\f*

\add And that\add* the whole \w land|strong="H0776"\w* thereof \add is\add* \w brimstone|strong="H1614"\w*, and \w salt|strong="H4417"\w*, \add and\add* \w burning|strong="H8316"\w*, \add that\add* it is not \w sown|strong="H2232"\w*, nor \w beareth|strong="H6779"\w*, nor any \w grass|strong="H6212"\w* \w groweth|strong="H5927"\w* therein, like the \w overthrow|strong="H4114"\w* of \w Sodom|strong="H5467"\w*, and \w Gomorrah|strong="H6017"\w*, \w Admah|strong="H0126"\w*, and \w Zeboim|strong="H6636"\w*, which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w overthrew|strong="H2015"\w* in his \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*, and in his \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w*:

Even all \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Wherefore hath the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* thus unto this \w land|strong="H0776"\w*? what \add meaneth\add* the \w heat|strong="H2750"\w* of this \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*?

Then men shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Because they have \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, which he \w made|strong="H3772"\w* with them when he brought them \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*:

For they \w went|strong="H3212"\w* and \w served|strong="H5647"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w worshipped|strong="H7812"\w* them, \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* whom they \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* not, and \add whom\add* he had not \w given|strong="H2505"\w* unto them:\f + \fr 29.26 \ft whom he…: or, who had not given to them any portion\f*\f + \fr 29.26 \ft given: Heb. divided\f*

And the \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* against this \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, to \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* upon it all the \w curses|strong="H7045"\w* that are \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in this \w book|strong="H5612"\w*:

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w rooted|strong="H5428"\w* them out of their \w land|strong="H0127"\w* in \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*, and in \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w*, and in \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w indignation|strong="H7110"\w*, and \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* them into \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, as \add it is\add* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

The \w secret|strong="H5641"\w* \add things belong\add* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: but those \add things which are\add* \w revealed|strong="H1540"\w* \add belong\add* unto us and to our \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, that \add we\add* may \w do|strong="H6213"\w* all the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of this \w law|strong="H8451"\w*.
